nodes.text: Former Jedi Master Eeth Koth was a member of a family. After his departure from the Jedi Order, Koth married the Zabrak female Mira, and together they had a baby daughter.
Eeth Koth's family first appeared through Eeth Koth in the 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, the first installment of the Star Wars prequel trilogy.
